problem Solved.

My thunderbird and the entirety of my OS was wiped by a nasty encounter with the latest upgrade routine from Linux Mint 22.2 to 22.3..... destroyed the lot.

So I had forgotten I had a Thunderbird add on to do the job for me

content: Export only works from Desktop Thunderbird to Thunderbird for Android, and between two installations of Thunderbird for Android. But you can't export from Thunderbird for Android to Desktop Thunderbird.
creator: christ1
